droid4me API documentation

droid4me is an Android framework library which makes the development of Android application faster and more robust.

See: Description

Core features 
Package Description
com.smartnsoft.droid4me
Contains the Activity/Fragment basis interfaces which define their life cycle.
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app
Contains all the Activity basis classes, an Android Application class, and some classes useful to activities.
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.appwidget
Handles Android desktop widgets.
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.content
This package is a counterpart of the android.content Android package.
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.log
Wraps and frameworks the Android menu feature.
Shared in the framework 
Package Description
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.bo
The definition of business objects used inside the framework.
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.framework
Defines some common types used throughout the library.
Caching and persistence 
Package Description
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.cache
Contains some caching features, based on RAM or/and the SD card (persistence) of the terminal.
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.ws
A framework for the Web Services (WS).
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.wscache
Joins together the caching feature and the Web Services.
Configuration 
Package Description
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.config
Contains a compact framework for handling the process configuration.
Bitmap downloader 
Package Description
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download
Contains utilities for downloading bitmaps and binding them to ImageView or any widget which can display a Bitmap.
Android Support Package 
Package Description
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.support.v4.app  
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.support.v4.content  
User Interface 
Package Description
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.graphics.drawable
This package is a counterpart of the android.graphics.drawable Android package.
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.ui
Some User Interface (UI) widgets.
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.widget
Gathers graphical and widget designs.
Utilities 
Package Description
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.util
Some helper classes.
Other Packages 
Package Description
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.analytics
Useful when it comes to handle analytics reporting in an industrial way.
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.animation
Gathers animations stuff.
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.debug
This package contains components dedicated to the debug and development of an application.
droid4me is an Android framework library which makes the development of Android application faster and more robust.

The library is composed by a framework for the Activity/Fragment, and of several packages dedicated to Android, such as a cache, an bitmap downloader, the handling of menu and contextual menus...
